hero.title: Refund Policy
hero.subtitle: We offer a 14-day refund window. Your satisfaction is our priority.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For refund requests or questions about this policy, please contact us at:

1.title: 1. Introduction
1.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. This policy explains your rights and how to exercise them.

2.title: 2. Consumer Right to Cancel (14-Day Window)
2.highlight: You have 14 days to cancel without giving any reason.
2.description: This right applies from the day after purchase.
2.p1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
2.p2: Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

3.title: 3. How to Request a Refund
3.description: To exercise your right to cancel:

methods.1: Email us at contact@example.com with your order details
methods.2: Use the model cancellation form in Section 4
methods.3: Send us a clear statement through our contact form

3.note_value: We will send you an acknowledgment of receipt without delay.

form.statement: I hereby give notice that I cancel my purchase:

5.title: 5. Effect of Cancellation
5.p1: If you cancel within the 14-day window, we will reimburse all payments received.
5.p2: We will process your reimbursement within 14 days.
5.p3: The reimbursement will use the same payment method you used.

6.title: 6. Exceptions to the Right to Cancel
6.content: Your right to cancel does not apply to digital content you have already started using.

7.title: 7. General Refund Policy
7.p1: Beyond the 14-day window, refund requests are reviewed case-by-case.
7.p2: We may refuse requests in cases of fraud or abuse.
7.note_value: This policy does not affect your statutory rights as a consumer.

8.title: 8. Sales Tax Refund Policy
8.p1: If you were charged sales tax and are registered, you may be entitled to a refund.
8.p2: Contact us within 60 days of purchase to request a tax refund.
8.p3: Requests after 60 days will not be processed.

connect_store.title: Connect Account
connect_store.content:
Welcome! This guide will walk you through connecting your account.

**1. Before You Begin**

Please prepare:

- An active account
- A browser where you're logged in
- Platform credentials

**2. Connection Process**

**Step 1: Sign in**

Access the platform homepage and sign in.

**Step 2: Get Connection Link**

- In the Dashboard, select the Account menu
- Click **Connect Account** button
- The system will generate a secure link

**Step 3: Authorize Access**

- Open your browser
- Navigate to the provided link
- Accept the authorization request

**Step 4: Complete Setup**

- Copy the verification code
- Return to the dashboard
- Paste the code to complete

**3. FAQ**

Q: Is this safe?
A: Absolutely. We use secure, verified connections.

Q: How many accounts can I connect?
A: Unlimited accounts supported.

Q: What if I encounter errors?
A: Contact our support team for assistance.
